rows: the set of all the individuals' posi-

headers:
the completion time of the job $\pi_{j}(i)(i \in$
J) on the machine $k_{j-1}\left(k_{j-1} \in \mathbf{M}_{j-1}\right)$ at the stage $(j-1)(j=2, \ldots, s)$
rows: the position of the job $i$ in the individual ia at time $t$
the position of the job $i$ in the individual ja at time $t$
the active gravitational mass of the individual ja at time $t$
the passive gravitational mass of the individual ia at time $t$
the inertia mass of the individual ia at time $t$
the gravitation of the job i between individual ia and individual ja at time $t$
the whole gravitation of the job i in the individual ia from the other individuals at time $t$
Euclidean distance between individual ia and individual ja at time $t$
the acceleration of the job i in the individual ia at time $t$
the worst fitness value in the population at time $t$
the parameter in gravitational constant $G(t)$ at time $t$
the position of the job i in the newly generated individual ia after crossover operation at time $t$
the position of the job i in the individual ia generated by the mutation strategy of standard DE algorithm at time $t$
the maximum position of the job i among all the individuals at time $t$
the minimum position of the job i among all the individuals at time $t$
the fitness of ia-th individual at time $t$
the average fitness value among the whole individuals at time $t$
the best fitness value among the whole individuals at time $t$
the average fitness value among the individuals whose fitness values are better than $f_{i_{a}}(t)$
the fitness value of the ia-th new individual after greedy strategy
